com.informatica.mdm.hdd

Class DatabaseType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.informatica.mdm.hdd.DatabaseType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Db2DatabaseType, OracleDatabaseType, SqlServerDatabaseType

    public class DatabaseType
extends Object
implements Serializable

    This class is a typesafe enum that represents a particular database. This class can map from string representations of a database to the correct enum. It can determine which enums, even though they are different, are from the same base database (i.e. they are both Oracle or both SQL Server).

    The proper way to determine if a database is of a particular base type is to use the base enums (those without version/type info in their name [eg. ORACLE, SQLSERVER] and use isSameDatabase on the enum to test, passing in the base database enum).

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • DatabaseType

        protected DatabaseType(String baseDatabaseName,
                       String databaseName,
                       String[] databaseRepresentations)
        Constructor to create enum value that is not a database that is to be connected to via ODBC.
        Parameters:
        baseDatabaseName - The base name of this database (i.e. its version generic name)
        databaseName - The name of the database that represents the enum.
        databaseRepresentations - An array of database representation strings, with the primary one first.

        public String getJdbcConnectionUrl(String hostName,
                                   String databaseServer,
                                   String databaseName,
                                   String port)
        Return the connection url for this database using the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        hostName - Name of the database host.
        databaseServer - Name of the database server.
        databaseName - Name of the database.
        port - Port for the connection.
        Returns:
        jdbc connction url

      • getJdbcConnectionUrl

        public String getJdbcConnectionUrl(String hostName,
                                   String databaseServer,
                                   String databaseName,
                                   String port,
                                   Boolean isSidConnectionType)
        Return the connection url for this database using the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        hostName - Name of the database host.
        databaseServer - Name of the database server.
        databaseName - Name of the database.
        port - Port for the connection.
        isSidConnectionType - Flag indicating if the URL should be generated for SID style connection type. true will generate a SID style URL, false will generate a SERVICE style URL. See "HORA-27698" for more details.
        Returns:
        jdbc connction url

      • isSameDatabase

        public boolean isSameDatabase(DatabaseType database)

        Determines if the database enum given is the same database.

        This tests against the base names of the databases, not the version-specific name as the == operator can do that comparison.

        Returns:
        true if they are the same database, else false.

      • isExactlyTheSameDatabase

        public boolean isExactlyTheSameDatabase(DatabaseType databaseType)

        Determines if the database enum given is the same database by comparing version-specific names, base names may be the same

        Parameters:
        databaseType - database type to compare
        Returns:
        true if they are exactly the same databases (by version specific names), else false.

      • resolveFromRepresentation

        public boolean resolveFromRepresentation(String databaseRepresentation)
        Determines if the given database representation can be resolved from the given database representation. For example, if this is the ORACLE constant, it will resolve from "ORA" but not from "SQLSVR".
        Parameters:
        databaseRepresentation - The database representation from which to resolve.
        Returns:
        true if the given representation maps to this enum.

        Returns:
        false by default

      • getDriverSpecificCursorTypeForResultSet

        public int getDriverSpecificCursorTypeForResultSet()
        When somebody wants to read database cursor returned by stored procedure as a ResultSet, he or she needs to prepare stored proc invocation in a special way depending on database type
        Returns:
        integer value representing JDBC driver-specific constant for Cursor type e.g. OracleTypes.CURSOR
